entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
